{{cpp/numeric/random/seed_seq/title|size}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/seed_seq/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|
std::size_t size() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the size of the underlying seed sequence.

===Return value===
{{box|{{rlpsi|/#v}}{{sep}}{{c/core|.size()}}}}

===Complexity===
Constant time.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;random&gt;

int main()
{
    std::seed_seq s1 = {-1, 0, 1};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; s1.size() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
3
}}
